songs.title: You and Your Heart
songs.lyrics:
Whatever you're feeling
I feel it too
Whatever your heart wants
I want you
And if you wonder this is true
I can see through you
I can see through

Love can happen anywhere
It happens all the time
Feels like something's changing
I can see it in your eyes

Somewhere along the way you came to stay
Somehow my world's been rolling around you and your heart
You and your heart

Whenever you're
Losing hope
Think about my loving
No, you're not alone
I guess I'm falling
Falling for you
You can see through me
You can see through
Love can happen anywhere
It happens all the time
Feels like something's changing
I can see it in your eyes

Somewhere along the way you came to stay
Somehow my world's been rolling around you and your heart
You and your heart

I feel my heart
It's colder
It's colder when I'm not with you
I feel my heart
It's whole next to you
I feel my heart
It's colder
It's colder when I'm not with you
I feel my heart
It's whole next to you

Somewhere along the way you came to stay
Somehow my world's been rolling around you and your heart
You and your heart
